text:
- Hugging Face is the leading
open platform for AI builders.
The reason we chose AWS is that we need
to provide a really great user experience
for these millions of people

who come to the Hugging
Face Hub every month

to find those models and
use them, download them.
Another reason we partner with AWS
is because the Amazon SageMaker platform.

It's easy to access, and we
deal with petabytes of data.
And it's easy to use our models
and libraries directly in SageMaker,

which is a platform
that's already been vetted

for their enterprise
with all of the control

and safety and security
and compliance features

that they need in order to
build AI with Hugging Face.
On the infrastructure side,
there was the release of HyperPod.
It's been a great solution for us

to scale the amount of
large model trainings

that we've been able to
achieve for the community.
So for instance, models like StarCoder,

which is state-of-the-art
for code generation,
models like IDEFICS,
which is state-of-the-art open model
for multimodal generation,
or models like Zephyr,

which is state-of-the-art
as a helpful assistant
to 7 billion parameter models.

All those models have been
built leveraging HyperPod.
So I'm excited to see

what the community will be
able to build using HyperPod.
(energetic upbeat music)
